channel.title: Blogging on Julian Carrasquillo
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on Julian Carrasquillo

item.title: Finally got a site up
item.description: Consider it an early birthday present to myself. While my summer courseload is winding down, I wanted to spend some time putting together a site. Most folks in the data science community suggest some type of presence - partially for visibility, but mostly to get your thoughts and projects in one place. I’ve done my fair share of googling how-to-do-this-thing-in-R, so it’s about time I contribute back. This site is built using Yihui Xie’s Blogdown package.
